[Y]Service Basics
[W]Maintenance without drama.
[c][m.]
[W]Gentle cleaning and proper storage do
[W]more than aggressive repair attempts.
[W]Label repairs and track dates so
[W]future troubleshooting is faster.
[c][m.]
[G]- Dry cleaning first.
[G]- Protect from dust.
[G]- Keep a repair log.
[m][m-]
[Y]WORKSHOP
[C]Slow careful work beats rushed
[C]heroics.
[c][m.]
[C]0 MAIN   [W]# HELP
